quality_assessment: Documentation is comprehensive and accurate on core algorithms but has outdated source file references that point to non-existent files. The actual module structure has been reorganized.

issues.description: Documentation references src/organization/god_object_detector.rs which does not exist. The module has been reorganized into src/organization/god_object/ subdirectory with multiple files.
issues.fix_suggestion: Update all source file references to reflect the modular src/organization/god_object/ directory structure

issues.description: Documentation references src/organization/god_object_analysis.rs:236-268 which does not exist
issues.should_be: The determine_confidence function is in src/organization/god_object/classifier.rs
issues.fix_suggestion: Update reference to correct file path

issues.description: Documentation references src/organization/behavioral_decomposition.rs which does not exist as a single file
issues.fix_suggestion: Update reference to reflect the behavioral_decomposition subdirectory structure

issues.description: Documentation references src/organization/god_object/classifier.rs:128-163 for infer_responsibility_with_confidence but function is at line 662
issues.fix_suggestion: Update line number reference to correct location

issues.description: Documentation references src/config.rs:500-582 which does not exist
issues.should_be: Configuration is spread across multiple files including src/commands/analyze/config.rs and src/cli/config_builder.rs
issues.fix_suggestion: Update to reference correct configuration file locations

issues.description: Documentation references recommend_module_splits function at src/organization/god_object_detector.rs:165-177 which doesn't exist as documented
issues.should_be: The split recommendation logic is in recommended_splits field and related functions in src/organization/god_object/split_types.rs
issues.fix_suggestion: Update reference to point to actual implementation location

issues.description: BehaviorCategory enum includes a Utilities category not mentioned in the documentation table
issues.current_content: Table shows 14 categories ending with Domain
issues.should_be: Include Utilities category: helpers, builders, factories, converters (with_*, from_*, into_*, as_*, default, any)
issues.fix_suggestion: Add Utilities category row to the table

issues.description: Troubleshooting section mentions 'base_score × 50 × violation_count' but actual code uses multiplier of 20.0
issues.current_content: The scoring algorithm uses exponential scaling (base_score × 50 × violation_count)
issues.should_be: The scoring algorithm uses 'base_score × 20.0 × violation_count' (reduced from 50.0 for more conservative scoring)
issues.fix_suggestion: Update troubleshooting section to reflect current scoring multiplier

Clear explanation of detection criteria for both god classes and god modules
Well-documented language-specific thresholds matching actual implementation
Good examples and case studies demonstrating detection behavior
Detailed scoring algorithm documentation matching code implementation
Clear explanation of confidence levels and violation counting
Useful troubleshooting section addressing common questions
All internal documentation links are valid
Configuration examples are accurate and helpful
CLI options section is comprehensive and accurate
